content:
Craft an item of type: warped_sign
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 10, "index": 26}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 53, "index": 28}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 2, "index": 29}, {"type": "heart_of_the_sea", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 5, "index": 36}]

thought: To craft warped_sign, I need to first craft warped_planks, which requires placing 1 stripped_warped_stem in the crafting table. Therefore, I will move the stripped_warped_stem from slot 29 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: warped_sign
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 10, "index": 26}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 53, "index": 28}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "heart_of_the_sea", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 5, "index": 36}]
thought: Now I can craft the warped_planks by moving them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: warped_sign
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 10, "index": 26}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 53, "index": 28}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "heart_of_the_sea", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 5, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft a warped sign, I first need to craft warped planks. The only available material is a stripped warped stem, so I will move it to the crafting grid in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: warped_sign
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 10, "index": 26}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 53, "index": 28}, {"type": "heart_of_the_sea", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 5, "index": 36}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the warped planks, I can move them out of the crafting grid to make room for the next recipe. I will move the planks to an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: warped_sign
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 10, "index": 26}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 53, "index": 28}, {"type": "heart_of_the_sea", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 5, "index": 36}]
thought: The warped sign recipe requires 3 warped planks in each row. Therefore I will first move one plank into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: warped_sign
inventory=[{"type": "warped_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 10, "index": 26}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 53, "index": 28}, {"type": "heart_of_the_sea", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 5, "index": 36}]
thought: After moving a plank to slot 1, I now need to move another plank to slot 2 so that there are 3 planks in the top row of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok

Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 8 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "warped_sign", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 10, "index": 26}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 53, "index": 28}, {"type": "heart_of_the_sea", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "phantom_membrane", "quantity": 5, "index": 36}]

act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
